availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert W. Smith (Estill County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Puddell Smith in Estill County, Kentucky on November 12, 1844. Father of Thomas M. Smith, Bettie Smith, Ellen Smith, Ann Smith, Robert Smith, Charles F. Smith, Virgil Smith, and Grant Smith. Saddler in Estill County in 1850. Attorney in Estill County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Irvine, p. 87B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Irvine, p. 275.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Irvine, p. 558A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Estill County Marriages, Film #000254628, p. 146.
